channel.title: [PI] Adding a command for sending messages from the server
channel.description:
I would like to add a command kind of like the yell, that make it so that when it yells, it says something like this:
(gold crown)[Server Announcement](gold crown): My message I type.
How would I do this? Thank you in advance.

item.title: [PI] Adding a command for sending messages from the server
item.dc:creator: @dddylan98 dddylan98
item.description:
@dddylan98 wrote:

I know and I figured it out, but I cannot get it to be red text. Here is my code:

if (c.playerRights >= 1){ c2.sendMessage("<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText("<shad=15695415>[Server Announcement]</col><img=2>: " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""));

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Adding a command for sending messages from the server
